content.en: Engine control optimization: Researchers have been investigating various algorithms to improve the control of different types of engines. These algorithms, such as Model Predictive Control (MPC), Nonlinear Model Predictive Control (NMPC), and Explicit Model Predictive Control (EMPC), are being used to design speed controllers, improve control strategies, and achieve fault-tolerant control in engines like natural gas engines, marine diesel engines, and turbofan engines. The goal is to optimize engine performance and achieve more efficient and dynamic control.
content.da: Optimering af motorstyring: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre styringen af forskellige motortyper. Disse algoritmer, såsom Model Predictive Control (MPC), Nonlinear Model Predictive Control (NMPC) og Explicit Model Predictive Control (EMPC), anvendes til at designe hastighedsregulatorer, forbedre styrestrategier og opnå fejltolerant styring i motorer som naturgasmotorer, marine dieselmotorer og turbofanmotorer. Målet er at optimere motorens ydeevne og opnå mere effektiv og dynamisk kontrol.
